title: Download start over and over
body: Hi, im trying to download the game but the client wont save my progress when i stop the process and try to download again it start at 0%(14,000 mg) over and over again at first says its scanning files and start at 6000 mg but then it jumps to 14,000 mg and start over. Help pls

replies.body: Stopping the update will cause the patcher to restart as well as rescan all of your game files for corruption before proceeding.  It's really important to let it do its thing without ending it early.  It's key to allow yourself time for the patcher to complete installing or updating!  Let me know if that clears things up.
